author: stoddard
msg: Win32: Use the COMSPEC envar to set the shell name.

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Update ap_writev() to take new parameters.

author: manoj
msg: Don't open a lock file unless we actually need it.

author: rbb
msg: Fix the logic for ap_signal, so it is exposed in external header files in APR.
Also change the header file included in http_log.c.

author: rbb
msg: We should never set the number of bytes written to -1 and return an error.
Errors are returned through the status, and we wrote zero bytes.
